meaningMnemonic: Who do you know that will <kanji>use</kanji> a <kanji>pole</kanji> to stop someone from breaking your <kanji>heart</kanji>? Your <vocabulary>bodyguard</vocabulary>! He's there to make sure no one hurts you, and for some reason he really likes using a pole to do it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
